languages.text: "Вас понял. Мой ответ был неуместным и неуважительным". {n}Соломон склоняет голову в знак смирения.{/n}
"Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вас понял. Мой ответ был неуместным и неуважительным". {n}Соломон склоняет голову в знак смирения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}

languages.text: 「了解しました。私の応答は、不適切かつ無礼なものでした」{n}ソロモーンは頭を下げ、謙虚に謝意を示した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「了解しました。私の応答は、不適切かつ無礼なものでした」{n}ソロモーンは頭を下げ、謙虚に謝意を示した。{/n}

languages.text: "Verstanden. Meine Antwort war unpassend und respektlos." {n}Solomorne senkt demütig den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verstanden. Meine Antwort war unpassend und respektlos." {n}Solomorne senkt demütig den Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: « Je comprends. Ma réponse était à la fois inappropriée et irrespectueuse. » {n}Solomorne incline humblement la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends. Ma réponse était à la fois inappropriée et irrespectueuse. » {n}Solomorne incline humblement la tête.{/n}

languages.text: «Entendido. Mi respuesta ha sido tan inapropiada como descortés». {n}Solomorne agacha humildemente la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entendido. Mi respuesta ha sido tan inapropiada como descortés». {n}Solomorne agacha humildemente la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: “遵命，我刚刚的答复确实很不合适，欠缺尊重。”{n}索罗蒙谦卑地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “遵命，我刚刚的答复确实很不合适，欠缺尊重。”{n}索罗蒙谦卑地低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: "Anlaşıldı. Yanıtım hem uygunsuz hem de saygısızcaydı." {n}Solomorne, alçakgönüllülükle başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Understood. My response was both inappropriate and disrespectful." {n}Solomorne humbly bows his head.{/n}
